title: Competitive Innovations in the Mortal Realms, June 11-17 2024: They Blew Up the Chicken Man

description: The Age of Darkness is a unique setting due to its massive variety of options: both in the flavor of building an army down to the gear of individual units, one of the major draws of The Horus Heresy is the customization and personalization in every part of the game. That being said, it’s not […]
title: Horus Heresy Hot Take: Charnabal Weapons Are Better Than You Think

description: On Thursday June 13, AMG announced the discontinuation of development on Star Wars: Armada and Star Wars: X-Wing. This came after a week of tense waiting when Asmodee quietly delisted all Star Wars: Armada stock from their store. Optimistic fellows hoped that this was a reboxing or some other sign of movement in the game’s […]
title: Star Wars: Armada – Obituary and Future

description: The last week before we have the broad meta adopt Kill Team: Termination, sees a busy weekend, with a few new entrants to the World Championships crowned! We’ve also got a broad view of the meta this week with some weekly snapshots from the ITC dataset. This data is not focused on GT’s specifically but […]
title: Competitive Innovations in Kill Team, June 11-17 2024

description: We really are in the final stages of the old metagame now – we know a Balance Dataslate is dropping this week, the Pariah missions release on the weekend, and the Sisters and GSC Codexes will start kicking in alongside them. Given that, and because we’ve been very busy, we’re going a little light this week […]
title: Competitive Innovations in 10th: Liminal Space Marines pt.1

description: Summer Game Fest might be over, but that doesn’t mean the summer of game announcements is, and Nintendo decided to show everyone how it was done during today’s Nintendo Direct, with a slew of titles that dwarfed entire days of the Summer Game Fest show itself. We’ve got a recap for you if you missed […]
title: Everything Shown at June 18th’s Nintendo Direct

description: Along with the usual cavalcade of product released with Ursula’s Return, Lorcana has also introduced an entirely new kind of dinglehopper that brings solo and co-op play to the game. I think this is great as it positions Lorcana as a competitor to co-op and solo board games, offering some crossover appeal to folks who […]
title: Mikey Mouse Club #25 – Illumineer’s Quest: Deep Trouble Review

description: The Goonhammer group is made up of dozens of multi-talented authors, many of whom have other projects outside of the site. title: 40K BADCAST 150 – CLOACA IN BIO
